education.title: Computer Science
education.description: Studying the fundamentals of computing, algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and emerging technologies. Focusing on software development and practical applications of technology.

education.title: Data Science Bootcamp
education.description: Intensive Data Science bootcamp covering data analysis, machine learning, data visualisation, and essential tools like Python, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, and Matplotlib.

education.title: Continuous Development
education.description: Always learning new technologies and improving skills through online courses, personal projects, and participation in developer communities.

certifications.title: PCEP™ Certification
certifications.description: PCEP™ – Certified Entry-Level Python Programmer by the Python Institute. Certification validating fundamental knowledge in Python programming, including syntax, semantics, and standard libraries.

objectives.title: Immediate Goal
objectives.description: I am seeking an internship or junior position in Python development or Data Science to apply my knowledge and gain practical experience in the job market.

objectives.title: Future Vision
objectives.description: I intend to specialise in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence, contributing to innovative projects that positively impact society through technology.

objectives.title: Continuous Learning
objectives.description: Committed to constant learning, always seeking new technologies, methodologies, and best practices to stay updated in the market.

objectives.title: Collaboration
objectives.description: Interested in working in multidisciplinary teams, contributing creative solutions, and learning from experienced professionals.
